function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The Covid-19 pandemic exacerbating social inequality, housing insecurity, and health disparities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, healthcare inequity, and social unrest","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted housing policies, improving healthcare access, and addressing social inequality","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying vulnerable populations, telehealth for remote healthcare access","People":"Vulnerable populations, low-income households, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, housing authorities"},{"Description":"Home as a locus of social harm during the Covid-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within households, heightened mental health issues, and social isolation","Mitigation":"Promoting safe housing practices, providing mental health support, and fostering community connections","Technologies":"Smart home devices for monitoring air quality, online counseling services for remote mental health support","People":"Households, individuals living in crowded or unsanitary conditions","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health professionals, housing advocates"},{"Description":"Insufficient regulation of harm in housing policy discourses","Impact":"Failure to address underlying social harms, perpetuation of health and housing inequities, and neglect of vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Incorporating harm reduction strategies, integrating social impact assessments, and consulting affected communities","Technologies":"Social impact assessment tools, community engagement platforms for policy feedback","People":"Policy makers, housing advocates, affected communities","Owner":"Government, advocacy groups, community organizations"}]}
